page.title: 16Old Folks' Home in Viewpark
page.content: Two of us went to interview the matron in the local home. We found out there are 36 patients and 21 staff. One lady is 100 and a man 91 years old. Two patients have been in since the home began in 1974. Patients are taken in depending on circumstances. Many are not local. They would like more visitors in the home. Patients are free to get up and go to bed when they like;most have th- eir own room and a TV. Some have pets such as budgies or fish. Some patients need help with eating,etc because of handicaps. Some old folk remembered when there were few houses here. They made us very welcome and we were happy to help with the work.
